title: Police: 1 dead, over 100 hurt in bomb attacks in Bangladesh
text:
Published By: Philly News Nation/World - Today 
DHAKA, Bangladesh (AP) - Police say unidentified attackers threw home-made bombs at thousands of Shiite devotees gathered at a shrine in Ban...
